name: NSBatchUpdateRequest
desc: A request to Core Data to do a batch update of data in a persistent store without loading any data into memory.

items.name: init(entity: NSEntityDescription)
items.desc: Creates a batch-update request for a managed entity.

items.name: init(entityName: String)
items.desc: Creates a batch-update request for a named managed entity.

items.name: var entity: NSEntityDescription
items.desc: The managed entity to update data for.

items.name: var entityName: String
items.desc: The name of the managed entity to update data for.

items.name: var includesSubentities: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to update subentities.

items.name: var predicate: NSPredicate?
items.desc: A predicate that identifies the objects to update.

items.name: var propertiesToUpdate: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary of property description pairs that describe the updates.

items.name: var resultType: NSBatchUpdateRequestResultType
items.desc: The type of result that Core Data returns from the request.
